body: If anyone can unban me that would be great, NolanDalton banned be because some guys were spawnkilling me and told him I was "hacking". I love how I got punished for doing nothing but the spawnkillers didn't have any punishments, so if ANYONE can unban me that would be great.

title: Banned for "using" regen hacks

replies.body: Email support@avicus.net to make an appeal. The forums aren't this place for this.

replies.body:
I can't watch 2 people at the same time, since I was suspicious of you, I watched you first.

E-mail support@avicus.net to appeal, or contact a manager on Skype.
